attributes.action: Award of SOUTH ATLANTIC MEDAL TO RMS ST HELENA,HMS LEDBURY,HMS BRECON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was part of the Task Force(Operation Corporate) in 1982 serving onboard HMS Ledbury in company with HMS Brecon and RMS St Helena. Although we were late arrivals, I believe that we deserve recognition for the small part that we played in that Operation in the award of the medal (Without Rosette) or a clasp to the GSM1962.

rejection.details:
Please refer to this Ministry of Defence website for further details:

http://www.mod.uk/defenceinternet/defencefor/veterans/medals/southatlantic.htm
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
